title: A Decade-long Landscape of Advanced Persistent Threats: Longitudinal Analysis and Global Trends
summary: An advanced persistent threat (APT) refers to a covert, long-term cyberattack, typically conducted by state-sponsored actors, targeting critical sectors and often remaining undetected for long periods.
